Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the music of 'Avengers: Endgame' (2019)?
Options:
A. A. Alan Silvestri composed the score for both Infinity War and Endgame.
B. B. The music for Avengers: Endgame was composed by Hans Zimmer.
C. C. Alan Silvestri was announced to return for scoring in June 2016.
D. D. The score for Avengers: Endgame features tracks from previous Marvel films.

Which of the following statements are true regarding the use of music in 'Avengers: Endgame' (2019)?
Options:
A. A. The theme from 'Ant-Man' (2015) was composed by Christophe Beck.
B. B. Christophe Beck's music was not featured in 'Avengers: Endgame'.
C. C. The 'Ant-Man' (2015) theme was incorporated into 'Avengers: Endgame'.
D. D. 'Avengers: Endgame' features original music by Christophe Beck.

In the movie 'Avengers: Endgame' (2019), which of the following statements about the music are true?
Options:
A. The theme from 'Doctor Strange' (2016) was composed by Michael Giacchino.
B. Michael Giacchino composed the entire score for 'Avengers: Endgame'.
C. The 'Doctor Strange' theme was featured in 'Avengers: Endgame'.
D. Michael Giacchino did not work on the music for 'Avengers: Endgame'.
Correct Answer: The theme from 'Doctor Strange' (2016) was composed by Michael Giacchino., The 'Doctor Strange' theme was featured in 'Avengers: Endgame'.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the use of music in 'Avengers: Endgame' (2019)?
Options:
A. A. The Captain Marvel theme was composed by Pinar Toprak.
B. B. Pinar Toprak composed the theme for Captain America.
C. C. The Captain Marvel theme was featured in 'Avengers: Endgame'.
D. D. Pinar Toprak is known for her work on the Captain Marvel theme.

Which of the following statements are true regarding the music in the movie 'Avengers: Endgame' (2019)?
Options:
A. A) Christophe Beck composed the theme music for Doctor Strange.
B. B) The movie features music that enhances its superhero themes.
C. C) Doctor Strange is a character from the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
D. D) The composer for 'Avengers: Endgame' is Christophe Beck.

In the movie 'Avengers: Endgame' (2019), which of the following statements about the music and composers are true?
Options:
A. A) Michael Giacchino composed the theme music for Doctor Strange.
B. B) Michael Giacchino is an Academy Award-winning composer.
C. C) The theme music for Doctor Strange was composed by someone other than Michael Giacchino.
D. D) Michael Giacchino has composed music for other Marvel movies.

Which of the following songs are featured in 'Avengers: Endgame' (2019)?
Options:
A. Redbone - Come and Get Your Love
B. AC/DC - Back in Black
C. Queen - Don't Stop Me Now
D. The Beatles - Here Comes the Sun
Correct Answer: Redbone - Come and Get Your Love, AC/DC - Back in Black, The Beatles - Here Comes the Sun

Question & Options:
In the movie 'Avengers: Endgame' (2019), which of the following songs from the Marvel Cinematic Universe soundtracks is featured in 'Guardians of the Galaxy'?
Options:
A. A) Come and Get Your Love
B. B) I Want You Back
C. C) Hooked on a Feeling
D. D) Don't Stop Believin'
Correct Answer: A) Come and Get Your Love, B) I Want You Back, C) Hooked on a Feeling

Question & Options:
In the movie 'Avengers: Endgame' (2019), which of the following songs is connected to the composer Jule Styne and was previously used in another Marvel movie?
Options:
A. A. It's Been a Long, Long Time
B. B. A Whole New World
C. C. Let It Go
D. D. Circle of Life
Correct Answer: A. It's Been a Long, Long Time
